name: Micro-Rave! Full Version
description:
Rhythm game made in two week with an accompanying animation. Use arrow keys or WASD to match the pattern. Tip: Press the key before the note hits the bar.

This is Micro-Rave! full version. You can play the full song and contribute to the online scoreboard. 

Contributors

Mia - Artist

Justin ( @xu3_shoe ) -  Musician

Max - Developer   

Resources

Inspired by Pikuniku dance level, FnF and Dance Dance Revolution

Popping Noises by Jeff Hottman on Youtube

Original Music by Justin X ( @xu3_shoe )

Thanks to Mr.Pineapple Studio for MongoDB tutorial

Thanks to SkyanSam of Skyrift Studios for the rhythm game tutorial
